title: Twitter's new executive chairman tweeted just 8 times before he got the job
text:
Twitter's new executive chairman tweeted just 8 times before he got the job 
Published By: Mashable - Today 
During Twitter's lengthy and much-criticized search for a new CEO, one criteria was paramount: the candidate should be intimately familiar w...
